Name: team
Title: Team | AidIQ.com
Body:
Our Team

We bring together a unique combination of experience in humanitarian response, disaster management, health care and software development.

Fran Boon

Managing Director

Fran is passionate about applying technology to solve the world's problems. Since graduating from Oxford University, he has spent 20 years working with Oxfam, NetHope, Tactical Technology Collective, Sahana, Inveneo, Asterisk and the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team.

He has travelled extensively, implementing systems, facilitating training courses and workshops including during major humanitarian disasters and longer-term sustainable development projects. His specific technology interests include Mapping (GIS) & Mobile solutions.

Dominic König

Lead Developer

Dominic is a software developer from Sweden, who has developed large parts of the Sahana Eden platform. His specialities include database design, open data standards and systems interoperability.

Dominic is also a passionate nurse with 17 years of experience in intensive care.
